result.title: First simulated contest
result.content:
Hello! I've been a little busy recently, but now I can simulate our first contest. The contest I've chosen is this one. It seems to be an easy one, but I think it would be good to start with it. The duration is 4 hours. Please don't read any problem or solution untill we finish it.

Here is the time I would like us to start the contest. I can put it one hour later if you want so. That's the interval I'm available.

I will make team with the first two who will confirm they want to participate.
